scheme_name: Market Support Scheme for Smaller Business Units
description: The Market Support Scheme for Smaller Business Units in Goa provides financial assistance to small businesses to enhance their market presence through promotional activities, exhibitions, and trade fairs. The scheme aims to improve competitiveness and visibility of small enterprises.
key_features: Financial aid for marketing and promotional activities
Support for participation in trade fairs and exhibitions
Enhances market access for small businesses

benefits.financial_assistance: Up to Rs. 5 Lakhs for marketing and promotional activities
benefits.reimbursement: Up to 50% of expenses for trade fairs, max Rs. 2 Lakhs

business_criteria: Must be a registered small business or MSME in Goa
Must have a valid Udyam Registration
operational_criteria: Must engage in marketing or promotional activities like trade fairs or exhibitions
Business must be operational for at least 1 year

eligible_activities: Participation in state, national, or international trade fairs

steps: Obtain the application form from the Directorate of Industries, Trade, and Commerce (DITC) in Goa
Submit the application with details of proposed marketing activities
Attach required documents, including MSME registration and expense estimates
Applications are reviewed by the DITC
Approved applicants receive funding or reimbursement
application_process.note: Reimbursement claims require proof of participation and expenses

special_notes: Funding is limited to approved marketing activities
Businesses must submit claims within the specified period
Priority is given to businesses with innovative products
